body:
Carousel Candy ==================== Carousel Candy is a dead simple approach to adding a slideshow/carousel to your website or application. The CSS is purposely limited as it lets the developer focus on skinning rather than overwriting prexisting styles. ### Features - Dragging - Breadcrumbs - Complete user controls Quick start --------------------- ### Basic Markup
Slide Content
Slide Content
Slide Content
